name: Cloud Hero: a Ninja Quest to Jump
name_original: Cloud Hero: a Ninja Quest to Jump
description:
High above the city, on the clouds, the brave heroes jump over difficult passages,
on birds, evade evil birds of prey and try to collect as many coins as possible for their secret society of ninjas.

In this Jump and Run - Side Scroller 2.5d game you have to time your timing of the jump and the use of the jetpack well, the challenge of the procedurally generated levels becomes more and more difficult as the level increases.

When you have reached enough level, the sandbox mode is unlocked and you can then put your skills to the test and achieve the high score so high that your friends will be jealous.

Post your high score and your unlocked skins on Twitter or Instagram under the hashtag #CloudHeroNinja
and show the whole world how good you are!

You can follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/El_Grande_Games

to stay tuned.

Highlights
  • FEATURES
  • * 100 levels, some of which are very tricky
  • * Sandbox mode including highscore
  • * Compare your high score with your friends
  • * Unlockable skins
  • * Time the jump and the jetpack to master everything
  • * Beautiful 2.5D graphics
  • * Varied levels
